articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Mohamed Salah will be fit to play in World Cup say Egypt
articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah will be fit to play in the World Cup for Egypt, his country's football association says.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: John Terry: Aston Villa captain leaves after play-off final defeat
articles.description: Aston Villa captain John Terry leaves the club after they failed to gain promotion to the Premier League.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: French Open 2018: Cameron Norrie fights back against Lucas Pouille
articles.description: Britain's Cameron Norrie wins the third set against France's 15th seed Lucas Pouille but their match is suspended in fading light.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: World Cup 2018: BBC to show tournament in Ultra HD & virtual reality
articles.description: Fans can watch this year's Fifa World Cup in Ultra HD and virtual reality as BBC Sport trials the cutting-edge technology.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England v Pakistan: James Anderson says team must show 'fight'
articles.description: England must show "heart" and "fight" in the second Test against Pakistan at Headingley, says bowler James Anderson.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: French Open 2018: Novak Djokovic beats Jaume Munar to reach third round
articles.description: Novak Djokovic books his place in the third round of the French Open with a hard-fought win over Spanish qualifier Jaume Munar.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Isle of Man TT: Dan Kneen killed in Superbike qualifying crash
articles.description: Manx rider Dan Kneen sustains fatal injuries in a Superbike qualifying crash at the Isle of Man TT, event organisers have confirmed.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England boss Jones defends training methods in light of injuries
articles.description: England boss Eddie Jones defends his training methods after stinging criticism from the Bath owner Bruce Craig.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Tennis star struggles with Yorkshire accent
articles.description: German Alexander Zverev admired the reporter's accent so much, he even promised to pay a visit to the county if they ever hold a tournament there.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England women: Jill Scott and Millie Bright back for World Cup qualifier
articles.description: Jill Scott and Millie Bright are recalled to the England women's squad for the World Cup qualifier in Russia on 8 June.
